name: Moon Runner
storyline: As a special unit deployed by Astral Cortex Industries, you are tasked with restarting the moon's infrastructure by finding and reactivating the monoliths across its surface. Manage your suit's energy to ensure your survival, find and trade modules to help you traverse the dangerous terrain and deal with enemy droids, malfunctioning due to the corrupting influence of something below the surface...
summary: An atmospheric survival shooter set on a small moon. You are tasked with finding the monoliths across the lunar landscape and restarting the moon's infrastructure. Traverse the dangerous terrain and deal with enemy droids corrupted by an ominous presence below the surface...
